otherLorem: Each text includes exercises with questions to assess the understanding achieved. This will allow you to reinforce your vocabulary, improve grammar and recognize expressions typical of Spanish.  Our texts are free and are designed by level of complexity. They can also be downloaded in PDF format.  If you want to learn Spanish or improve your level of the language, these resources will be of great help.
